signature_drinks.menu_description: Each drink at Lim carries a story - sometimes your own, sometimes someone else's, sometimes one that never happened but could have

The Echo Sour.effect: Drinking it makes you vividly relive the last time you laughed so hard you cried
The Echo Sour.serving_note: One sip, and you'll remember the last time you laughed till your ribs ached. It's tart, but it'll sweeten your night.

Velvet Corridor.description: Dark, smooth, with a faint lavender glow
Velvet Corridor.effect: A sip places you in a dreamlike hallway from your own past, letting you wander for a few moments before returning
Velvet Corridor.serving_note: Smooth as velvet, with a twist of lavender. You'll walk a hallway that only ever lived inside your own head. Careful though — sometimes those doors open.

The Parting Glass.description: Sweet and heavy, with smoky undertones
The Parting Glass.effect: It brings back the memory of a goodbye — not the words, just the ache of it
The Parting Glass.serving_note: Sweet and smoky. It won't tell you who you said goodbye to, but you'll feel the weight of it. Some folks like to chase it with a smile, some with a tear.

Honeyed Static.description: Golden, fizzing, tastes of warmth and radio waves
Honeyed Static.effect: Fills your mind with half-overheard voices and forgotten songs
Honeyed Static.serving_note: Golden fizz, radio waves and honey. You'll hear voices you forgot you missed. They don't always say your name, but they mean it just the same.
